tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Hi there is no doubt that Dr Budhiraja is unflappable and having experience of approximately more twenty years. 
Since I  visited the clinic (on the strong recommendations of a senior govt. Officer of NCT Delhi) on 19 may for denture since I had fed up with one dentist nearby my residence  (he could not deliver the right denture even after ten weeks and returned my money) a lot of harassment and pain suffered with his hit and trial method. Visited again on 24 may. 
Meanwhile I suffered severe  pain in one of my teeth. I consulted learned Dr on 25 may and subsequently visited clinic at mayur vihar on 26 may Dr did not attend me personally instead one junior did. Till date I have been suffering for the same after a long gap of more than  two 
weeks.out of five sittings Dr himself has taken three whereas two by juniors. I have been told that teeth severely infected same time anti bio.  course taken. 
I am 63 year plus and undergone many RCT but this time much longer time. The cause/reason best known to Dr. 
How much more time required I can't see. 
Rest is fine high end machines installed for quick *** ******** ********** Great and warm regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Teeth Straightening,Dental X-Ray,Gap Closing,
review:
MY SELF S C TYAGI RETIRED FROM INDIAN ARMY ASCON NET WORK COMMUNICATION PROJECT 
WE AND Our  ALL DEPARTMENTS OFFICIALS/Staff visiting To Dr BUDHI RAJA DENTAL CLINIC SINCE LAST 20years 
In net shell we can say THE DOCTOR HAND IS VERY SOFT/supportive/ **** *********/BEST MANAGEMENT/Time management/ECONOMICALLY JUSTIFIED/clean/
I have no more word to praise this professionally managed 
Clinic
God bless him and full team 
S C TYAGI 
EX CHIEF FINANCE MANAGER 
ITI LTD ASCON PROJECT 
MOBILE **********
reply_text: Thank you Tyagi Sir will keep on serving you with more care . Regards

review: Hi! Doctor is good but his clinic Management  is not good .My family attached this clinic from last 2 & 3 year ago on that time that service was good but now days service is not up to mark  when They opend new clinic in Mayur Vihar Ph 2 than pandav nagar clinic has effected....... Vibhor Jain

There are few issues., , for very procedure, a new doctor will come on visit basis on a date which sometimes you are informed only 2 days before and then there is absolute mis coordination. Dr Buddiraja himself won't treat all cases, he has to take help of other doctors on visit basis, and that is where, you will find yourself waiting and struggling in crowd.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have been visiting Clinic of Dr Budhiraja for the last about 15 years.  All my dental problems were resolved and today at the age of 87 years I remain blessed with original teeth.  The credit for this goes to Dr Budhiraja who treats his patients with utmost sincerity and
reply_text: Thank you so much RK Jain ji this is the best feedback I have received I am overwhelmed.Regards

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted for sensitivity in 2nd molar when I was there for getting my dislodged filling in first molar filled again (Filled by the clinic in first place). I was told to get it refilled as current filling was incorrectly done.

- 8 sittings.
- Re filling of second and third molar.
- Treatment costed me about 3K.
- I now have even tooth ache with sensitivity in second molar.

Thanks...

Have you heard scaling without sestivity ? I havnt as i didnt experience before visiting this cleanic. Awesome experience and higher level satisfaction. I would recommend this clinic to everyone for any dental problem. I dont recall the name of doctor but she was super doer awesome.
Atul Tripathi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited for Dental treatment *** ** *** *** ******** *** ********* *** **** ********* ******* * ** * ******* *** **** *** ** ******** * ** * ****** He call for visit and in 5 mins he says come on next visit.  Doctor himself just give advice to his staff and the way their Junior Doctors operate also is very unprofessional. I visited almost 10 to 12 times for RCT for couple of tooths but it's still not fixed properly. I also face trouble getting proper original bills and after many follow ups for days, we get the final bill that too of amount lesser than what we actually spent in their clinic!! The most important thing half of my treatment was done by some other doctor as i was in lot of pain and doctor was not available, still so many visited at Dr. Budhiraja clinic.

Sensitive and Comparative. Treatment satisfactory. Time generously given with care  and concern. Appreciate the tendency to avoid over medication. Waiting beyond the designated time is somewhat bothersome. But generally I have no complaints. I will continue to consult and advise others in need.
Thank yoy, Dr Bupesh Buddhiraja and your team. Mahendra Prasad Singh Professor of
Political Science
Formerly of  the University of Delhi.
Presently, Editor, Indian Journal of Public Administration (IIPA/SAGE)

It was a meeningful meeting with doctor and we get the proper advise in right direction which helped us to start a proper treatment. All staff is very supportive and well educated . All doctors in his team are experienced and very cooperative. Best part is that Dr Budhiraja personally spend time with the patient and discuss with the team to provide the best solution to his patients. I have visited his clinic many time earlier also and he is very reasonable and available most of the time .

Thank you

The cap which was fixed by the doctor did not last for even a year. 
When I went with the uprooted cap, the doctor simply denied that this was done by him.
But when I told him that I had all the prescriptions and bills, he admitted and asked one of his junior doctors to fix it.
But that also didn't last for a couple of months.
I have spent a lot of money , **** ** *******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Sorry to say but Doctor Bhupesh himself  wasn't available. Though he is a very fine doctor (have got treatment done in past too) in town but if we book from Practo the seriousness should be obeyed. It gives trouble to the patient who come from far places, book on practo due to the authenticity of being available and when you reach the clinic you get to know the doctor is unavailable. Sad!
Shivanki

I am feeling good of treatment in this clinic 
That is good cooperation all doctors.
I have all friend if any problems in teeth please visit this clinic you feel better
We are having a earlier experience with doctor for our elder son is. Good.  So we came for our younger son and getting good treatment...
Good experience any satisfied always with treatment .we will tell others also as many people have dental problems so even then can also get good treatment as we are getting.
I've been visiting Dr.Buddhiraja for over 20 years,he's a very good dentist..takes time to evaluate & solve all dental problems..
Doctor buddhiraja has very nice behaviour. H is the best dentist I have ever met. Staff behaviour also very friendly. Must visit.

review: I am suffering from  pyria and gum problem but after treatment I am  feeling better and satisfied with the treatment

Treatment done is quite satisfactory but attended after a long wait of 1 hour inspite of pre appointment. For a female diabetic patient of 73 years age, such a long wait is quite irritable and uncomfortable.       
 INDRA GARG

Good experience. Doctor is qualified and polite.
Recommended for tooth treatment.
Has good setup including OPG m/c.

I was in too much pain but only even after one visit I felt so much relief.I am an enemic person;even after this she treated me so well physically as well as mentally also bcz I was too afraid before Rct.Thanks so much Dr.Himashi.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback will keep on doing the good job for you and all.Thanks n Regards
